title: Business Challenges
subtitle: Common problems that slow down modern businesses and how technology can solve them

items.title: Slow Manual Processes
items.description: Teams waste hours on repetitive tasks that could be automated, reducing productivity and increasing human error.

items.title: Poor Data Insights
items.description: Critical business decisions are made with incomplete information due to scattered data and lack of analytics.

items.title: System Integration Issues
items.description: Different software tools don't communicate well, creating data silos and workflow bottlenecks.

items.title: Scalability Limitations
items.description: Current systems can't handle business growth, leading to crashes, slowdowns, and lost opportunities.
